seo.title: $11k+ Pure Profit from One Buyer: Team Case Study - One Partners
seo.description: Discover how our team buyer achieved $11k+ pure profit with proven frameworks, working tech, and consistent optimization strategies.

hero.subtitle: Case Study
hero.title: $11k+ Pure Profit from One Buyer
hero.description: At our partners' request, we're sharing results from one of our buyers — breaking down all the key elements of a profitable run.

intro.title: The Profitable Framework
intro.description: We scaled this funnel and added tests for new angles. One of the team's buyers agreed to break down his working funnel and share all the details — except the offer. Take notes, analyze the case, and borrow what works for your own launches.

sections.title: 1. Creatives: 50/50 Spy vs In-house
sections.content:
"I actively tested different creatives: grabbed from spy tools and built my own — 50/50.

Conversions came in from both, but my custom creatives always performed better.

Best results came from the evergreen combo — gameplay + emotion, and also UGC-style influencer videos showing gameplay on mobile."

IMPORTANT: Local voiceover gives a big trust boost and improves conversions. Take the time to generate AI voiceovers in the local language — look for good speech samples in other creatives or videos, and aim for natural intonation and flow.

sections.title: 2. Accounts: 25% self-farmed, 75% agency
sections.content:
Agency accounts work as a stable base for scaling.

"We farm our own accounts (King + personal). They hook better and don't have limit issues — scale is smooth."

sections.title: 3. Apps & Funnel Setup
sections.content:
We used the smartlink+ tech from ZM Apps to capture a wider audience. That allowed us to pull traffic from both iOS and Android within the same campaign.

• iOS users were sent to a regular iOS app
• Android users landed on a custom PWA created inside the ZM Apps dashboard

"We never lowball the targeting — that always ends in low quality and cuts.

We trim weak creatives, scale the age targeting, test various PWAs, and leave only what performs best."

Also test the new PWA Games format — these are interactive prelanders that fully simulate the game. Users get familiar with the mechanics and even receive a bonus before downloading — which massively boosts click-to-install.

IMPORTANT: Running traffic through smartlink+ maximizes user coverage. That's why iOS traffic ends up cheaper, and your ROI increases.

sections.title: 4. Quality: 100%+ Redeposits
sections.content:
"This run delivered over 100% redeposits: 400+ RDs.

Though the average dep was on the low side — around $12."

Alongside scaling Chicken (this particular funnel), we also started testing slots-based angles like Egypt, Bonanza, and Zeus.

conclusion.title: Final Thoughts
conclusion.description:
There's no such thing as a secret sauce.

But there is a set of proven frameworks, access to working tech, and consistent work on testing, analysis, and optimization.

When you combine all of that into a system — that's when you start getting what everyone's here for: consistent profit.

cta.finalText: Ready to implement proven frameworks and achieve $11k+ profit like our team buyer?

form.title: Ready to Scale Your Profits?
form.description: Let's discuss how we can help you implement these proven strategies and achieve similar results. Our team of experts is ready to share working frameworks and tech.
form.disclaimer: We'll respond within 24 hours with a personalized strategy proposal.
